title: Teaching my Students to Love Bugs
author: Ms. Maya Higa
summary: Alveus is a nonprofit organization founded by Maya Higa that functions as a wildlife sanctuary and as a virtual education center facility to provide permanent homes to non-releasable animal ambassadors.

title: The Challenges of a Repetitive Historical Cycle
author: Mr. Hasan Piker
summary: Hasan streams on Twitch, where he discusses politics, news, social issues, and current events, often from a socialist perspective.

title: Day 50 on Our 1st Grade Coding Journey
author: Ms. Coder Coder
summary: I personally think it's good idea for front-end web developers to know at least a bit of back-end, and vice versa. At the very least, learning the basics of both will help you figure out if you like front-end or back-end web development better.

title: Fighting for Fair Pay
author: Mr. Eduardo Vargas
summary: Los Angeles public school workers continue to fight for fair wages in historic 3-day solidarity strike
